Book Review: My Value Creation Journey (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: Bartley J. Madden has produced a book that challenges business leaders and investment professionals to think outside the box systematically to solve difficult problems.

elements.title: Private Markets’ Governance: A New Era (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: Now that the SEC Private Fund Adviser rules have been struck down, it's incumbent on the industry to demonstrate how private ordering can work.

elements.title: The Interplay Between Cap Rates and Interest Rates (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: What is the relationship between cap rates and interest rates? It's not as straightforward as you may think.

elements.title: Still Misperceived? A Fresh Look at Bitcoin Volatility (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: Is Bitcoin considerably more volatile than other asset classes? It's important to approach this question analytically and with an open mind because perceptions do not always match reality.

elements.title: FX Bubbles: Through the Lens of Shiller and Sornette (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: The theories and models introduced by Robert Shiller and Didier Sornette are as applicable to the foreign exchange market as they are to the stock market.

elements.title: Book Review: A Wealth of Well-Being (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: Finance practitioners can benefit from Meir Statman's challenge to make finance an “afterthought” and spend more time thinking about life well-being.

elements.title: What’s Your Client’s Optimal Equity Allocation? (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: Note to investment advisors: You may be overestimating the risks of equities for conservative investors with longer investment horizons.

elements.title: Gold and Inflation: An Unstable Relationship (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: While there are periods when gold has hedged inflation quite well, beware blanket claims of gold's inflation-hedging utility.

elements.title: Net-Zero Hour (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: CFA Institute is contributing to the net-zero discussion with the aim to bring clarity around certain issues impacting investors.

elements.title: Monetary Policy and Financial Conditions: Meaningful Relationship? (CFA Institute Daily Browse)
elements.contents: An analysis of the Fed's recent rounds of quantitative tightening (QT) and quantitative easing (QE) yields actionable insights about the relationship between monetary policy and financial conditions.
